paper.title: A clustering approach for scenario tree reduction: an application to a stochastic programming portfolio optimization problem
paper.abstract: This paper deals with the problem of scenario tree reduction for stochastic programming problems. In particular, a reduction method based on cluster analysis is proposed and tested on a portfolio optimization problem. Extensive computational experiments were carried out to evaluate the performance of the proposed approach, both in terms of computational efficiency and efficacy. The analysis of the results shows that the clustering approach exhibits good performance also when compared with other reduction approaches.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是基于聚类分析的场景树缩减方法，并明确提到该方法应用于投资组合优化问题。论文的研究目标和实验设计均围绕投资组合管理展开，因此其主要应用领域是投资组合管理。
